name: User
description: A user is a record of a user of the application.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the user.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The first name of the user.

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The last name of the user.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email of the user.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The phone number of the user.

fields.name: address
fields.description: The address of the user.

fields.name: city
fields.description: The city of the user.

fields.name: state
fields.description: The state of the user.

fields.name: zip_code
fields.description: The zip code of the user.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of the user.

fields.name: document_type
fields.description: The type of document the user has.

fields.name: document_file
fields.description: The file of the document the user has.

name: Admin
description: An admin is a record of an admin of the application. It can be a super admin or an admin.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the admin.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The first name of the admin.

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The last name of the admin.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email of the admin.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The phone number of the admin.

name: SuperAdmin
description: A super admin is a record of a super admin of the application. There can only be one super admin.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the super admin.

name: Transaction
description: A transaction is a record of a financial transaction between two parties. It can be a deposit, withdrawal, or transfer.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

fields.name: reference_number
fields.description: The reference number for the transaction.

fields.name: channel
fields.description: The channel through which the transaction was made.

name: Swap
description: A swap is a record of a swap transaction between two parties. It can be a swap from one currency to another.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the swap.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of the swap.

fields.name: from_wallet_id
fields.description: The wallet id of the user swapping from.

fields.name: to_currency
fields.description: The currency the user is swapping to.

name: Address
description: An address is a record of an address of a user. It can be an address for a user.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the address.

fields.name: town
fields.description: The town of the address.

fields.name: state
fields.description: The state of the address.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of the address.

name: KYC
description: A KYC is a record of a KYC transaction between a user and an admin. It can be a KYC for a user.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the KYC.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the KYC.

fields.name: reason
fields.description: The reason for the KYC rejection if it is rejected.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the KYC.

fields.name: document_type
fields.description: The type of document the user has.

name: Wallet
description: A wallet is a record of a wallet of a user. It can be a wallet for a user.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the wallet.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: The balance of the wallet.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The currency of the wallet.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: The user id of the wallet.

name: Deposit
description: A deposit is a record of a deposit transaction on a wallet. It can be a deposit on a wallet.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the deposit.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of the deposit.

name: Withdrawal
description: A withdrawal is a record of a withdrawal transaction on a wallet. It can be a withdrawal on a wallet.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the withdrawal.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of the withdrawal.
